Key Match Events: David Warner smashed a half-century in his 100th T20I
Adam Zampa picked up 3-26 off four overs
Brandon King and Johnson Charles smashed a half-century partnership inside four overs
Zampa outsmarted West Indies with a brilliant 16th over to claim the wickets of Russell and Nicholas Pooran
Pre-Game Insights: The three-match series effectively starts T20 World Cup preparations for both teams
Josh Inglis got first crack at opening the batting for Australia
West Indies’ seamers struggled to threaten with the new ball
West Indies’ big-hitters went for broke but fell away despite a late onslaught from Holder
Post-Match Reflections: Warner joined Ross Taylor and Virat Kohli as the only players to have reached 100 internationals in each format
West Indies will want to address their sloppy fielding mired by a couple of dropped catches and misfields
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Warner made 70 in his 100th T20I game
West Indies were stacked with all-rounders
Jason Behrendorff struggled to generate swing in the first over
Glenn Maxwell's off-spin was monstered by Charles for 17 runs
